鯈字的基本解释

鯈
tiáo
古同“鲦”。

鯈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tiáo］
［《廣韻》直由切，平尤，澄。］
［《集韻》田聊切，平蕭，定。］
“儵2”的被通假字。
(1)鱼名。又名白鯈、白鲦。一种生于淡水的小白鱼。
(2)古代神话传说中的鱼名。

鯈字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鯈； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1471第14
【唐韻】以周切【集韻】夷周切，?音由。【說文】魚名。【集韻】與鮋同。【莊子·秋水篇】鯈魚出游。【音義】卽白鯈魚也。【淮南子·覽冥訓】不得其道者，若觀鯈魚。【註】鯈魚，小魚。【正字通】俗呼參條魚，長而小，時浮水面，性好遊，故名。又【山海經】帶山彭水西流至芘湖，其中多鯈魚，其狀如雞赤尾，三尾六足四目，其音如鵲。○按與《莊子》《淮南子》別是一種。又地名。【左傳·文十七年】將悉敝賦以待于鯈。【註】鯈，晉鄭之境。又人名。《左傳》晉公子伯鯈，後漢劉鯈。又【廣韻】直由切【集韻】【韻會】?留切【正韻】除留切，?音儔。義同。又【集韻】【正韻】?田聊切，音迢。本作鰷。詳鰷字註。

鯈字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鯈字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tiáo］
["Guang Yun" straight from the cut, Ping You, Cheng. ]
["Jiyun" Tian Liaoqie, Pingxiao, Ding. ]
"倏2" was passed falsely.
(1) The name of the fish. Also known as white mince and white mince. A small white fish born in fresh water.
(2) Fish names in ancient myths and legends.
Minnow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鲦; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1471 14
[Tang Yun] Cut by Zhou [Ji Yun] Yi Zhou cut,? Sound origin. [Said the text] The name of the fish. 【Jiyun】Same as Lu. 【Zhuangzi·Autumn Water】Minnows go out. [Sound meaning] 卽 white minnow also. 【Huainanzi·Lan Mingxun】Those who do not know what to do are like watching minnows. [Note] Minnow, small fish. [Zhengzitong] The common name is ginseng fish, long and small, floating on the surface of the water, good for swimming, hence the name. Also [Shanhaijing] takes the mountain and Pengshui to the Pyrene Lake, where there are many minnows, which are like chicken red tail, three tails, six legs and four eyes, and their sounds are like magpies. ○It is different from "Zhuangzi" and "Huainanzi". Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan·Wen Seventeen Years] Give Xi Zhi to wait in the minnow. [Note] Min, the realm of Jin and Zheng. Another name. "Zuo Zhuan" Jin Gongzi Bo Min, Later Han Liu Min. And [Guang Yun] straight from the cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Stay cut [Zheng Yun] In addition to stay cut,? Yin Feng. The same meaning. Also [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Tian talks and cuts, the sound is lingering. This is a minnow. Detailed note of the word minnow.
